properties.displayName: New Remote Desktop Connection Initiated Via Mstsc.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((ProcessCommandLine contains " -v:" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /v:") and (FolderPath endswith "\\mstsc.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "mstsc.exe")) and (not((ProcessCommandLine contains "C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\WSL\\wslg.rdp" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath =~ "C:\\Windows\\System32\\lxss\\wslhost.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects the usage of "mstsc.exe" with the "/v" flag to initiate a connection to a remote server.
